channel.title: Oppening up another program in Java
channel.description: How do i use Java to open up a new file separate from the running java file? Example: Use a readme button to open up a html file. (It's a exe file though)

item.title: Oppening up another program in Java
item.dc:creator: @Evil1 Evil_
item.description:
@Evil1 wrote:

Runtime.getRuntime().exec(“filename.exe”);

I also think that the Desktop object has the ability to do this.

Desktop.getDesktop().open(“filename”);

In the Desktop object, you can open any file and it’ll use the default file for that system to open it (I.E. you can open a html file and it’ll open with the default browser.)

Read full topic
item.source: Oppening up another program in Java
